mapper.sql: id, action, entity_type, entity_id, user_id, method, parameters, duration, success, error_message, created_at
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sys_audit_log (action, entity_type, entity_id, user_id, method, parameters, duration, success, error_message, created_at) VALUES (#{action}, #{entityType}, #{entityId}, #{userId}, #{method}, #{parameters}, #{duration}, #{success}, #{errorMessage}, #{createdAt})
mapper.select: SELECT FROM sys_audit_log WHERE user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
SELECT FROM sys_audit_log WHERE entity_type = #{entityType} AND entity_id = #{entityId} ORDER BY created_at DESC
